template_default.title: Embed maker
description: *error messages when a link or color is invalid don't show currently*
## Here's some useful tricks to get you started:
template_default.footer: üîª Use the buttons down below to get started üîª

fields.name: # Discord
value: - **`\$USERNAME`** will be replaced with your user/display name

fields.name: # Calendar
value: - **`\$YEAR`** or **`\$year`** will be replaced with the current year
- **`\$MONTH`** or **`\$month`** will be replaced with the current month
- **`\$DAY`** or **`\$day`** will be replaced with the current day

templates.description:
This is a template made to test `Embed Maker's` capabilities
YYYY: $YEAR
MM: $MONTH | M: $month
DD: $DAY | D: $day
